articles.description: An international team of physicists has found that deep-learning AI technology can accurately quantify the amount of entanglement in a given system—prior research has shown that the degree of "quantumness" of a given system can be described by a single number…

articles.title: Deadly solar storm coming towards Earth today; CME clouds approaching fast - HT Tech
articles.description: In just a little while from now, the Earth is expected to be hit by a powerful solar storm event as a CME cloud released on July 28 is headed in our direction. Check details.
